thread.title: Marketforce Hosts Thirteenth Annual Conference on the Future of Private Banking & Wealth Management
thread.title_full: Marketforce Hosts Thirteenth Annual Conference on the Future of Private Banking & Wealth Management - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Marketforce Hosts Thirteenth Annual Conference on the Future of Private Banking & Wealth Management
text:
Marketforce Hosts Thirteenth Annual Conference on the Future of Private Banking & Wealth Management
ln its 13th year, The Future of Private Banking & Wealth Management returns to London on 4th November 2015, providing a leading strategic forum to discuss the key industry issues of today and tomorrow.
London, United Kingdom, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Designed for leading executives in private banking & wealth management, this event explores the latest strategies for growth in a complex economic environment, the application of technology in client management, digital development and innovations, and the way business models are changing to reflect the changing expectation of clients.
With high-level speakers from the top private banks and wealth management firms, delegates will receive a global perspective of the latest opportunities and innovations available in this sector and how the leading forms are adapting to improve their client management.
Brilliant networking opportunities provide attendees with a chance to discuss major issues with over 125 senior level delegates, exploring the ways in which digital technology and new entrants are transforming the industry alongside debates on how best to stay competitive in an increasingly complex environment.
"A thought-provoking conference, with valuable insights into key topics affecting private banking from some of the industry's key leaders." - Managing Director, HSBC Private Bank
"A very well organised conference with thought provoking and relevant content" - Chief Executive, Arbuthnot Latham.
"An influential conference on a subject that is critically important to the profitability of the industry." - Senior and Founding Partner, Vestra Wealth
Please visit the website for more information on the programme and speakers. For any queries call +44 (0)207 760 8699 or send an email at conferences@marketforce.eu.com.
#privatebanking15
